title: Detailed API call descriptions not available in x64dbg
content:
I am following a RE tutorial, and the guy is using Ollydbg while I use x64dbg... and I don't find all the descriptions in that Olly has, and it's quite annoying ! There is an example from the two programs running the same Reverseme :

How can I enable the same detailed descriptions in x64dbg? Is it even possible?

answers_data.content:
Out of the box, x64dbg doesn't have a feature to show Win API call descriptions unlike OllyDbg.

For that, you need to use a plugin like xAnalyzer or the older APIInfo Plugin .

comments.text: +100 ! You entirely answered my question ! Tanks !
